name: Puff Pops
description: A snack with lots of different flavors. If you close your eyes, you won't be able to guess what flavor you'll get next, and eating them is sure to increase your heart rate — and that's what makes this popular amongst the Scions of the Canopy. By the way, the "pop" part of the name comes from the sound of Grainfruit kernels bursting open under high temperatures.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Puff Pops
suspicious.description: A snack with lots of different flavors. To eat several in a row is to experience a myriad of strange flavors that... burn your stomach? Did you just have bad luck with flavors, or are they all like this?
suspicious.effect: A little surprise from the Scions of the Canopy.

normal.name: Puff Pops
normal.description: A snack with lots of different flavors. If you close your eyes, you won't be able to guess what flavor you'll get next, and eating them is sure to increase your heart rate — and that's what makes this popular amongst the Scions of the Canopy. By the way, the "pop" part of the name comes from the sound of Grainfruit kernels bursting open under high temperatures.
normal.effect: A little surprise from the Scions of the Canopy.

delicious.name: Delicious Puff Pops
delicious.description: A snack with lots of different flavors. These surprising flavors of these "little bombs" explode between your teeth. Your left and right hands work in unison, sending more hurtling headlong into your mouth. Om nom nom — amid the sound of chewing, all your stress melts away.
delicious.effect: A little surprise from the Scions of the Canopy.
